name: Typing Torture Deluxe
description:
Improve your typing skills with Typing Torture Deluxe! This game will test your typing skills as it throws word after word at you across the screen. Just don’t let any word cross the left side of your screen to stay in the game.

The game comes with more than 3800 words and features original piano music for your typing enjoyment. The 12 backgrounds used in the game were downloaded from  Pixabay.com. 

The original music can be heard here: https://soundcloud.com/gavinkoh/chemin-vers-votre-cur

Gameplay Instructions:

To play, just choose a level (out of 3) and type any of the words that fly across the screen. Spacebars and deleting is not required at all… once you’re committed, you just have to finish typing the word. Don’t let any word touch the left border of your screen. At the end of the game, your typing results will be computed.
